name: fullstack-open-part4
description: **Note:** this course material was written with version v20.11.0 of Node.js. Please make sure that your version of Node is at least as new as the version used in the material (you can check the version by running `node -v` in the command line).

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../bloglist-frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist
scripts.build:dev: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../bloglist-frontend && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../bloglist-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
